name: Justclick Reg
author: Serhiy Derepa

sections.description:
Enable automatic subsription to Justclick.ru (http://justclick.ru) mailing group for new registered user, also automatic remove subsription when user deleted.

In order plugin to work you must have active account on Justclick.ru service.
sections.installation:
1. Uncompress downloaded zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Under Settings Admin menu use Justclick Reg link to set up required parameters.
    Again, you must have active account on Justclick.ru service.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0-beta

  • This is the first beta release.

1.0

Plugin release.
